name: hardcorio
title: 作死历程:SC2
author: Stx3, maroder
description: 通过全面替换敌人和战斗机制，并添加生命保障机制，把异星工厂完全转变为生存游戏。
description_original: Experimental version 27.08.2016(without full testing). Remake of Stx3's Hardcorio:SC2. Hardcorio:SC2 turns Factorio into a hardcore survival game, by completely replacing the enemies, combat mechanics and added life support requirements.
